mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PUBLICSERVICE(SERVICEID, SERVICENAME, SERVICEPURPOSE, SELECTTIONCRITERIA, DOCUMENTS, ORGANIZATIONNAME, CONTACTPHONE, DEADLINE, APPLICATIONMETHOD, SITEURL, RECEPTIONORGNAME, SUPPORTCONTENT, SUPPORTTARGET, SUPPORTTYPE, STATUTE) VALUES(#{serviceId}, #{serviceName}, #{servicePurpose}, #{selecttionCriteria}, #{documents}, #{organizationName}, #{contactPhone}, #{deadline}, #{applicationMethod}, #{siteUrl}, #{receptionOrgName}, #{supportContent}, #{supportTarget}, #{supportType}, #{statute})
